shri lankawe yuda aparadha siduwu bawata chodana karamin chanal fo nalikawa ikuthda wikashaya kala aluthma widiyowen podurajya mandalayiya samuluwata kisindu balapamak nathayi aanduwa awadharanaya karayi.podu rajya mandalayiya samuluwa yanu ek ek ratawal sambandhayen wen wenwa sakachcha karana wedikawak nowa samajika ratawal siyallata podu karunu pamanak awadhanaya yomu karana sthanayak bawada widesha katayuthu amathyanshaya pawasayi.me hethuwen adala widiyowa sambandhayen kisidu sakachchawak ho podu rajya mandalayiya samuluwedi sidunowanu athayida ema amathyanshaya sadahan karayi.kese wethath ema widiyowen chanal fo nalikawa yojana karanne podu rajya mandalayiya samuluwata sahabhagi wanne dayi bi්rathanyaye saha indiyawe agamathiwarun dewarak sitha baliya yuthu bawayi.me athara widesha katayuthu amathyanshaya penwa denne shri lankawa sambandhayen kathabahata lakwana sama awasthawakadima brithanya chanal 4 nalikawa wisin shri lankawata apahasu kirime saha rajaye hamuda apahasuthawata pathkirime aramunin nirmanathmaka widiyopata idiripath karana bawayi.mita pera wikashaya wu widiyopata menma meyada asathya ekak bawada ema amathyanshaya kiyayi.
